text: aur (vah vakt yaad karo) jab hamane farishton ko hukm diya ki aadam ko sajada karo to ibalees ke siva sabane sajada kiya (ye ibalees) jinnaat se tha to apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se nikal bhaaga to (logon) kya mujhe chhodakar usako aur usakee aulaad ko apana dost banaate ho haaloki vah tumhaara (qadeemee) dushman hain zaalimon (ne khuda ke badale shaitaan ko apana dost banaaya ye un) ka kya bura aivaz hai
